name: South Surfers Park
summary:
Welcome to the Penguin Water Park!

Let's dive and feel the real water!

You can't swim? No problem. It's the same for this penguin.

You can play a Water Slide, Adventure, and Wild River attraction.

And 100 levels are waiting for you.

EXTREME WATER SLIDE

-Experience real water slide physics in 3D.

The slide can reach too much speed! Don't panic!

Don't be afraid! the penguin's life is up to your own control!

WATER ADVENTURE

Run and Jump! Do not fall in the water!

Because this penguin can't swim.

WILD RIVER

-Super rough and wild river flow!

Be careful! Pigs will disturb you.
